Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing a variable supplements fund for sanitation members of the New York city employees' retirement system
Summary: Relates to establishing a variable supplements fund for sanitation members of the New York city employees' retirement system; creates a board to manage such fund and to make payments.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a variable supplements fund for sanitation members of the New York city employees' retirement system
